name: height
label: Height

name: images

description: List of images in the picture slider.

fields.name: circular
fields.label: Circular
fields.description: Determines whether the slider should be circular

fields.name: infinite
fields.label: Infinite
fields.description: Determines whether the slider should be infinite. Note: It is possible to create a non-circular, infinite slider, but it is not possible to create a circular, non-infinite slider. (true or false)

fields.name: responsive
fields.label: Responsive
fields.description: Determines whether the slider should be responsive. If true, the items will be resized to fill the carousel.

fields.name: direction
fields.label: Direction (right/left/up/down)
fields.description: The direction to scroll the carousel, determines whether the carousel scrolls horizontal or vertical and -when the carousel scrolls automatically- in what direction.

fields.name: align
fields.label: Align (center/left/right/false)
fields.description: Whether and how to align the items inside a fixed width/height.

fields.name: synchronise
fields.label: Synchronise ADD MORE INFO
fields.description: Selector for the slider to synchronise.

fields.name: cookie
fields.label: Cookie ADD MORE INFO
fields.description: Determines whether the carousel should start at its last viewed position.
